function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High concentration of people in street markets increases the risk of disease transmission","Impact":"Potential for widespread transmission of contagious diseases in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Regulating the number of vendors and visitors, implementing physical distancing measures, and providing hygiene facilities","Technologies":"Digital monitoring systems to track crowd density and alert authorities, contactless payment systems for transactions","People":"Street vendors, shoppers, and residents in the vicinity of street markets","Owner":"Local governments and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Economic recession and loss of income for street vendors may lead to increased vulnerability to illness","Impact":"Decreased access to healthcare and increased susceptibility to illness and disease","Mitigation":"Providing financial support, access to healthcare services, and opportunities for alternative sources of income","Technologies":"Mobile payment platforms, telemedicine services, and online market platforms","People":"Street vendors and their families","Owner":"Government and non-governmental organizations"},{"Description":"Large influx of undocumented workers in the informal sector poses a risk to public health and social stability","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission and political unrest due to limited access to healthcare and social protection","Mitigation":"Implementing regularization programs, providing access to healthcare and social services, and addressing the root causes of migration","Technologies":"Biometric identification systems for documentation, digital healthcare records for undocumented workers, and data analytics for migration patterns","People":"Undocumented workers, local communities, and government agencies","Owner":"Government and international organizations"}]}
